message: Let's start fair. I'll take the majority, but I'll leave you a decent share.
"Let's make this work.  It's a reasonable split, and we both get a faire amount.  What do you thing?"
I'm sticking with my original offer. You lose 10% on each round you reject, so it's in your best interest to accept now.
"Here's a fair split that gives us both a decent amount.  Let's settle this now!"
I'm not budging. Your share is shrinking with every round. Accept my offer and we can both get a good deal, or keep rejecting and watch your share dwindle further.
I know this isn't much, but with inflation, it's better than rejecting a losing even more.  Let's wrap this up!
